characters.name: Victor Moon
characters.desc: Son of two skilled craftsmen, he is branching off from his family trade to study magic.

characters.name: Ivenna Brightheart
characters.desc: Daughter of a prestigious mage lineage (the Brighthearts), she has been outcast from the family after revealing that she has no magical ability.

details.title: Geography
details.body: Arcaenus is a magical floating island in the sky with magical rocks that keep it up. These rocks, called Arcana Crystals, hold many mysterious properties.

details.title: People
details.body: Arcaena is home to many mages (those who have the ability to channel the magic of Arcana Crystals) and craftsmen (those who craft advanced technology using Arcana Crystals).

details.title: Chicago
details.body: I thought this was a state but apparently it is a city in some pokemon state (Illumise?)
